name: Keycloak PassportJS Auth Strategy
description: Keycloak PassportJS connector that enables the use of multiple realms in the same application (multi-tenancy), integrating with oAuth2/Open ID Connect 'clients' in keycloak, and getting users' data+roles from keycloak automatically via the JSON API. It is aims to be a feature-complete drop-in solution for NodeJS projects using PassportJS for authenitcation and authorization.
